lead_paragraph: Sandra Bullock, who appears in the hit films “The Blind Side” and “The Proposal,” has been named the top box office draw of 2009 in a survey of theater owners and executives.
snippet: Sandra Bullock, who appears in the hit films “The Blind Side” and “The Proposal,” has been named the top box office draw of 2009 in a survey of theater owners and executives.

headline.main: Survey Shows Bullock Is All the Way Back
headline.print_headline: Survey Shows Bullock Is All the Way Back
